remarks: Special case of ~ cdlemf showing existence of a non-identity translation.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2013.)
statement:
cdlemftr0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemftr0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemftr0.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemftr0 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> E. f e. T f =/= ( _I |` B ) ) $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
